product_name: Horny Toad Sea Change Pants - Women's
long_description: You and your friends rent a canoe at the lakeshore and get well splashed as you head back to shore. Thankfully you're wearing the women's water-friendly Sea Change Pants from Horny Toad. Quick-drying lyocell/stretch polyester fabric takes you from damp to dry by the time you reach the cafe. Hidden front zipper at right thigh secures your cash and ID. Front hand and 2 back drop-in pockets feature drain-and-dry mesh. Button-tab detail holds rolled-up pants at the calf. Angled back yoke and internal drawcord create a customized fit. Horny Toad Sea Change Pants for women offer UPF 45 sun protection.
short_description: You and your friends rent a canoe at the lakeshore and get well splashed as you head back to shore. Thankfully you're wearing the women's water-friendly Sea Change Pants from Horny Toad.
